body:
hi

1. right now, it's not obvious what decks i am using vs AI

2. will be good to swap decks with AI if i find current deck too powerful.

3. add comments to deck ? (i.e. personal deck rating, etc)

4. will be good if there's a puzzle mode where the AI is given a set of progressively stronger decks to fight the human.
author: [eng60...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110165659478391424989/)
title: deck name should be displayed. allow swap deck with AI function etc etc

comments.body:
Hi eng60340,

Thanks for the suggestions. Because it's easier for us when each issue has one suggestion or bug, I'll make new issues for suggestions 2 to 4 and comment on the first suggestion here.

1. I'm not quite sure at what point in the game you think the difference between your deck and the AI deck isn't clear. Is this on the 'New Duel' screen (where you chose colors) or while playing a match? Please elaborate as making things more obvious is important to us.

2. moved to issue 160 3. moved to issue 161 4. moved to issue 162

**Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
1. I'm not quite sure at what point in the game you think the difference between your deck and the AI deck isn't clear. Is this on the 'New Duel' screen (where you chose colors) or while playing a match? Please elaborate as making things more obvious is important to us.

yes. unable to know deck name when you start a new duel (it' s labelled as unsaved deck) or during a game.
comments.author: [eng60...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110165659478391424989/)

comments.body:
I see.

Well the deck has no name because it was just generated by the game. I guess we could put the user name in front of the deck name, i.e.
Player - Deck (Unsaved Deck) - 40 cards

But the name of the owner of the deck is already there, next to the image on the active tab. So I'm not sure if it's really needed to make things more clear.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
oh, didn't know the decks are just generated.

i thought the AI will get an assigned deck from the deck folder :)

please consider have a "load deck" button (for AI or player) at a more prominent place
comments.author: [eng60...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110165659478391424989/)

comments.body:
It is possible to let the game pick a random deck from the Magarena/decks folder. I updated the wiki ( https://code.google.com/p/magarena/wiki/UINewDuel ) to make that more clear.

The problem I see with adding a "Load deck" button is that once we do that someone else might request a "New deck" button, then a "Save deck" button, etc. And we would end up with a not very user friendly interface. Menu options may not be very visible but they are a great way to reduce screen clutter.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Most of the suggested enhancements are now part of the main release. I'm not a fan of adding extra buttons while a menu option would suffice so I'll close this issue.

Feel free to add other suggestions but please stick to one suggestion per issue, thank you.

**Status:** WontFix
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
